attributes.action: Change vets charges for there consulting fees and secondary consulting fees .
attributes.additional_details:
So every one knows what they have to pay no matter which vet practice they use.
A lot put price even higher when they know the animal is insured.
Also different prices for medication that I know is a lot cheaper online with a vet percription.
attributes.background:
Change what all vets charge for consultant fees make them a standard price across the board.
Also the secondary consulting fees to be half the price of the main fee

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament don't have a role in setting vet fees. 

You could start a petition calling for the Government to be responsible for setting vet fees, if that's something you'd like to happen.
